title: Must Read: Ulta Beauty's Q1 2025 Sales Rebound, Beautycounter Is Returning as Counter
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Friday. On Thursday, Ulta Beauty released its first quarter fiscal 2025 results which showed its net sales increased 4.5% to $2.8 billion.
